basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello everyone! My name is Tiffani Rice and I am a full stack developer currently living in the greater Seattle area. I possess 7 years of prior experience with aviation companies, such as General Electric, specializing in large scale, project coordination, personnel management, and customer support. In March, I made a switch into studying tech because I wanted a career that would intellectually keep me stimulated and after completing the full stack course at CodeFellows, I can safely say that I have found JUST THAT in being a developer. When I am not studing software deveopement, my relaxation go tos are exploring beautiful Washington parks, watching TikToks for a questionable amout of time, or listening to true crime or comedy podcasts

projects.title: TheLazyTravelers
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with, in a team environment at Code Fellows. This application allows users to view vaious vacation images, and vote on their favorite spot! Once voting has commenced, the user will be able to view details on the location, as well as information on how to book a flight and rent a hotel in that area.

projects.title: City Explorer API
projects.description: Personal study project for Code Fellows that allows a user to vote 25 times on a favorite novelty product, after which a chart will render detailing their top choices.

projects.title: JarJar Beats
projects.description: An app that allows users to search for an artist's top songs and add items to a customized playlist.
